EmailTemplate.description: AutoResponse email sent when an case for an LE is created
EmailTemplate.name: AutoResponse - NOC Live Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Live Event Support {!Case.CaseNumber} [ {!Case.Thread_Id} ] {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
YOUR LIVE EVENT SUPPORT IS SCHEDULED
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Our Network Operations Center is ready to provide support for your upcoming live stream event. We will follow up to coordinate all relevant details.
Please, answer this short questionnaire at your earliest convenience. It is essential you provide the information about your event, so we can ensure it is successful: https://forms.gle/V3uCWAJ9yUqdanwF6
A case was created with the following information:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Opened on: {!Case.CreatedDate} Subject: {!Case.Subject}
Please also check the following best practices and general documents to ensure the success of your event:
Brightcove Live Best Practices: https://live.support.brightcove.com/live-api/guides/brightcove-live-best-practices.html
Brightcove Live API: https://live.support.brightcove.com/live-api/getting-started/overview-brightcove-live-api.html
Cloud Playout: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/cloud-playout/index.html https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cloud-playout-apis/index.html
SimuLive https://live.support.brightcove.com/live-api/code-samples/simulated-live.html
Feel free to reply to this email with questions.
Best regards, The Brightcove Network Operations Center
You can see all of your cases in our Support Portal, and the current system status is always available on our Status Page.
